title: Date Night
introduction: This lesson covers a dialogue between two individuals on a date, discussing their interests, preferences, and getting to know each other better.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Este lugar es muy bonito, ¿cómo lo encontraste?
story.translation: This place is very nice, how did you find it?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Lo vi en una reseña online. Dijeron que la comida aquí es excelente.
story.translation: I saw it in an online review. They said the food here is excellent.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Me encanta probar nueva comida. ¿Qué platos recomiendas?
story.translation: I love trying new food. What dishes do you recommend?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: El salmón al horno y la ensalada César son muy populares.
story.translation: The baked salmon and Caesar salad are very popular.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Suena delicioso. Además, me encanta el ambiente aquí.
story.translation: Sounds delicious. Also, I love the atmosphere here.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Sí, es perfecto para una noche especial. ¿Qué te gusta hacer en tu tiempo libre?
story.translation: Yes, it's perfect for a special night. What do you like to do in your free time?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Me gusta leer y caminar por la playa. ¿Y tú?
story.translation: I like to read and walk on the beach. And you?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Soy fanático del cine y de la fotografía.
story.translation: I'm a fan of movies and photography.
